greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of 1s in Stolarsky representation of n.
comment: For the Stolarsky representation of n, see the C. Mongoven link.
link: C. Mongoven, Description of Stolarsky Representations
example: The Stolarsky representation of 19 is 11101. This has 4 1s. So a(19) = 4.
results.author: _Casey Mongoven_, Nov 19 2011
